formalText: She doesn't know what to do.
She keeps thinking things will get better things.
When her and her therapist talked on the phone, but she was talking about getting help and said this was after she was start starting to feel a little bit better in the hospital anywhere.
She feels guilty about getting now she should just be out of here.

And she said that in kind of a self-conscious way of knowing that it was still perfectly reasonable for her to be in the hospital, but she thinks she was saying that she is completely desperate, that she doesn't care anymore.

She was terrified that the therapist would find out that she was depressed and wanted to talk about anything but and she kinds of has a different assualt of a very different perspective on that which is that there is there was something very dangerous about the possibility of getting the help, and that she was sort of desperate to protect herself.
She is afraid she'll kill herself.
